name: Pardon my English!
description:
You are moving to a new home in a faraway countryside called Oak Town. Everything is new and you are nervous, but also eager to make friends with the locals there.  Answer their time-sensitive questions correctly to increase your social points with them. 

  • This game covers English vocabulary and pronunciation.
  • Choose to play between 3 different game modes: Vocabulary: Quiz, Vocabulary: Drag & Drop and Pronunciation.
  • You are required to answer the Game Effectiveness Evaluation Form twice. Once before playing the game, and again after playing it.
  • You are also required to answer the Motivation Evaluation Form after playing the game.

Take as much time as you want and have fun :)
